snippet: With his party's nominating convention approaching, President Obama started a four-day campaign swing in Iowa on Saturday, returning to the state where he opened his unlikely quest for the presidency five years ago.
abstract: With his party's nominating convention approaching, President Obama started a four-day campaign swing in Iowa on Saturday, returning to the state where he opened his unlikely quest for the presidency five years ago.

headline.main: Obama Visits Swing States Before Convention
